title: Elo gains in silver looking for a support
body:
Ay looking for a lad in silver (I'm Silver V atm but always going up and doing between that and Silver 1) It's okay if you're like high bronze and i'm not gonna argue if you're gold, generally I just want a boy that can banter whilst playing like if you're a rage fuel meat head then just don't bother that has comms and can play at least like 3-4 supports well.

Add ya boy Direwolf for some sick elo gains,

replies.body: id love to duo .. i just play support .. ive been climbing to s1 promos n dropping down s3 .. id love to support if your keened?
I'll play some games with ya, I'm silver 3 at the moment and love the banter hahaa I'll add you tonight if I get on
